ygData.subject: Idea for an allegiance system in EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, all. Saw this club listed in the new editon of Strategy Guide, and thought it might be a good place to share info and drink a pint ;) I recently started
ygData.messageBody:
Hi, all. Saw this club listed in the new editon
of Strategy Guide, and thought it might be a good
place to share info and drink a pint ;) I recently
started playing with a buddy who was big into Asheron's
Call, and from discussions with him I got the idea for
an allegiance system in EQ. It's too long to post
here, but please read it at the following and tell me
what you think!
<br><br><a href=http://www.everlore.com/MB_SHOW.asp?FID=76&FN=MainHall&SID=7&SN=Everlore&TID=448441&TN=Allegiance+System+for+EQ&CAT=General&SURL=http%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Eeverlore%2Ecom&PL=3 target=new>http://www.everlore.com/MB_SHOW.asp?FID=76&FN=MainHall&SID=7&SN=Everlore&TID=448
441&TN=Allegiance+System+for+EQ&CAT=General&SURL=http%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Eeverlore%2Ec
om&PL=3</a>
